string-array.name: hints
string-array.item: We all love spending time with our friends so we decided to make it easier to meet them. Blendin lets you know which of your friends are out partying and where they are.
Go out with new people who shares your interests. just select your activity and press go !
discover what your friends have been into and share your hangouts
create your squad , chat with them and arrange new hangouts !
